item.description:
The second Triatha-newbie workout is here!
Tues / Thurs @ 6:30pm
Sun @ 8 am

Thursday, July 24, 2008 Workout:

Ride: Mt. Auburn and Esplanade Workout- Bike
Start: Washington Square
Finish: Washington Square
Description: Almost entirely flat (great spinning ride), follows the Charles River on a bike path and a spin around Mt. Auburn Cemetery (some small hills) before returning via flat, fast paths and roads.
Distance: 16 miles (+2 miles at Mt. Auburn Cemetery) = 18 miles

Map: http://www.gmap-pedom...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting on a bench outside with a bike
item.name: Mt. Auburn and Esplanade Workout- Bike
